prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell-like body and a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon resembling a sea slug with soft pink tones and a gentle expression.
Generate an aquatic creature that thrives in wetlands and has a whimsical design.
Imagine a Pokemon with a smooth, amorphous body and a cheerful personality.
Design a Pokemon that glides through water, featuring vibrant colors and unique textures.
Give me a charming Pokemon that resembles a mollusk and loves sunbathing by the shore.
Make a small, cute Pokemon with a pink body and a friendly demeanor, perfect for kids.
